tweets.author: クニ
tweets.text:
This is right after the Red and White Support V began, P splits into the Red Team and White Team in an instant
#アイマスMOIW2025前夜祭

thread_replies.author: 田中ブンケイ
thread_replies.text:
#imasMOIW2025

It's cold! So everyone, please be careful to stay warm.
The parking lot exhibition area too, take care!

thread_replies.author: T田P
thread_replies.text:
Just to confirm again, I managed to catch the Hayabusa at 6:39, so I should be able to make it to the MOIW in person somehow!
Your warm words were a great encouragement along the way...!
I'll keep pushing a bit more until I arrive on site

thread_replies.author: とーるP【俺たちネクロマンサーズ】
thread_replies.text:
Thank you JR-san, thank you 
Over 1000 kilometers from Sapporo,
24 hours since arriving at New Chitose Airport,
Over 17 hours since the route change,
Finally... arrived at Shin-Osaka Station!

Now heading to the accommodation to drop off luggage before going to the venue!!

thread_replies.author: train@11/16_ISF_F11
thread_replies.text:
Today is MOIW day, isn't it!
I won't say what it is, but please feel free to use it as you like.

thread_replies.author: クニ
thread_replies.text:
This is right after the Red and White Support V began, P splits into the Red Team and White Team in an instant
#アイマスMOIW2025前夜祭

thread_replies.author: なちゅらる
thread_replies.text:
My voice is featured in the Kōhaku Support V.
#アイマスMOIW2025_day1

thread_replies.author: DKMS US
thread_replies.text:
Shout out to all of these heroes for donating their stem cells and giving someone a second chance at life. 

Thousands of patients are still searching for their match; you could be the one. Register today!

thread_replies.author: たかめ@日本語読めない卓
thread_replies.text:
The Kōhaku support V was so hyped, and Karakusa Sabō was too cute, it was absolutely amazing 

#MOIW2025前夜祭

tweets.author: なちゅらる
tweets.text:
My voice is featured in the Kōhaku Support V.
#アイマスMOIW2025_day1

thread_replies.author: なちゅらる
thread_replies.text: The only minor gripe I had from last time's MOIW2023 was that only 765's songs came up and the performers had too little stage time, so this time my satisfaction level is super high. It showed the organizers that 765NEI is still going strong in their prime, right?

thread_replies.author: コノケ@C107 2日目東”キ”-09a 委託
thread_replies.text:
えぇ...？だって紅白応援Vの各アイドルのセリフ聞いた...？

天海春香「後ろの席まで、ちゃーんと見えてるからねー！！」

萩原雪歩「穴掘って埋まってます〜！」

花海咲季「一番星、取りに行くわよ！！」

葛城リーリヤ「あの地平まで届かせます！！」

ズルすぎんかこれ...
 #アイマスMOIW2025_day1

thread_replies.author: てんぴー
thread_replies.text:
まずは、ありがとう

“紅白応援V”  “アマテラス”
お前たちを待っていた

ブロック最前列の通路席
控えめに言っても神席
終わりの飲み会へ​───────

Real fees → real burns.
USD pegged supplier rewards.
Dynamic, usage based supply.
Deflation > dilution.

tweets.author: ふる
tweets.text:
This is Chiyuki's part in the Kohaku support V, right?  
I burst out laughing lol

tweets.author: ともゆきP
tweets.text: At the Kohaku support V, Tomoyuki P's block was for the red team, but the otaku two spots over was stubbornly yelling "white!" all by himself, and after the song ended, the P behind me (a total stranger) said, "There was a traitor among us," and I couldn't help but turn around

ズルすぎんかこれ...
